content: For the full year of fiscal 2022, we are raising our guidance for the third time this year and now expect total revenue to be in the range of $217 million to $217.5 million, subscription revenue to be in the range of $158.4 million to $158.9 million, adjusted EBITDA to be in the range of $31.9 million to $32.4 million, representing an adjusted EBITDA margin of 15% and non-GAAP EPS to be in the range of $0.70 to $0.72 per share based on a fully diluted share count of approximately 36.9 million shares.
